title: Curse of Inaccuracy
desc:
Post 1262
- Choose a player, curse them with Inaccuracy.
- Innacuracy: Whenever you draw a card ending in 2, roll a d6 the next time you play a card, on a 1, it fails and returns to your hand, on a 2, the effect is nulled, on a 3, if applicable, the target affected is randomized.
- May alternatively be used to cleanse a curse on you.
